description: Adds one or more pieces of evidence to a control in an Audit Manager assessment. You can import manual evidence from any S3 bucket by specifying the S3 URI of the object. You can also upload a file from your browser, or enter plain text in response to a risk assessment question. The following restrictions apply to this action: For more information about Audit Manager service restrictions, see Quotas and restrictions for Audit Manager.

parameters.name: controlSetId
parameters.description: The identifier for the control set.

parameters.name: manualEvidence
parameters.description: The list of manual evidence objects. (dict) --- Evidence that's manually added to a control in Audit Manager. manualEvidence can be one of the following: evidenceFileName, s3ResourcePath, or textResponse. s3ResourcePath (string) --- The S3 URL of the object that's imported as manual evidence. textResponse (string) --- The plain text response that's entered and saved as manual evidence. evidenceFileName (string) --- The name of the file that's uploaded as manual evidence. This name is populated using the evidenceFileName value from the GetEvidenceFileUploadUrl API response.

nested_params.name: s3ResourcePath
nested_params.description: The S3 URL of the object that's imported as manual evidence.

nested_params.name: textResponse
nested_params.description: The plain text response that's entered and saved as manual evidence.

nested_params.name: evidenceFileName
nested_params.description: The name of the file that's uploaded as manual evidence. This name is populated using the evidenceFileName value from the GetEvidenceFileUploadUrl API response.

nested_items.name: errors
nested_items.description: A list of errors that the BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControl API returned.

nested_items.name: manualEvidence
nested_items.description: Manual evidence that can't be collected automatically by Audit Manager.

nested_items.name: s3ResourcePath
nested_items.description: The S3 URL of the object that's imported as manual evidence.

nested_items.name: textResponse
nested_items.description: The plain text response that's entered and saved as manual evidence.

nested_items.name: evidenceFileName
nested_items.description: The name of the file that's uploaded as manual evidence. This name is populated using the evidenceFileName value from the GetEvidenceFileUploadUrl API response.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The error code that the BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControl API returned.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message that the BatchImportEvidenceToAssessmentControl API returned.
